name: Henna Brows
description: Henna Brows are a semi-permanent eyebrow treatment that tints the eyebrow hair and stains the skin, creating the appearance of fuller, more defined brows. It's a longer-lasting alternative to regular brow tints and will last up to 10 days on skin and up to 6 weeks on hairs.

name: Brow Wax
description: After outlining the ideal brow shape for your face, wax is applied to remove unwanted hair.

name: Eyebrow Stain
description: Eyebrow Stain offers a more subtle, natural appearance than Henna Brows, which are darker, more visible and dramatic. Brow stain will last on skin up to 10 days and 4-6 weeks on hairs.

name: Expert Brows
description: Expert Brows are highly defined, 3D brow shapes that will be achieved through brow mapping, shaping, threading, waxing and tinting (and eyebrow extensions).

name: Eyebrow Tint
description: Eyebrow Tint is the process of applying tint to enhance and define your brows, darkening fine hairs in and around your eyebrows.

name: Eyebrow Extensions
description: Individual hairs are glued to skin or existing hair to create an instantly fuller brow. They are available in a variety of colours and lengths, and last 5-14 days. Touch-ups are required every 2 weeks.
